column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The food was exceptional. Wedge salad was fresh and crisp
column2: and the bacon on top was fantastic. I would order bacon as side separately next time. Â The dry aged steak was very soft and flavorful. We asked for between med rare and medium
column3: and it was cooked perfectly to the spot we wanted. The dressing for steak tasted too strong though. I felt simply some salt is enough to bring the best out of the meat. The cocktails were good too
column4: but a powerful red wine might go better with the steak.
